attributes.action: Rebuild the swimming pool in Swinton
attributes.additional_details:
I know a lot of you have cars and don't mind travelling to other towns to use their facilities, but please think about others that don't have cars (or children that can't drive).

Adult swim session + bus travel = £8
A typical family swim of 2 adults + 1 Child would cost £20.40 for one hour of fun.
Also due to bus times, a 1 hour session could take up to 3 hours out of your day.

Please sign this petition and help out your none car owning family/friends/neighbours.
attributes.background:
Please replace a much loved and sorely missed amenity in our town.
Too many community buildings are being demolished and soon we will have no amenities left at all.
Recreational facilities in Swinton are in dire short supply and our residents really need this situation to be rectified.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions about local leisure facilities are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor
